question: {name} has {x} {area}s of {fruit} field. There are {k} {fruit}s per a fraction of {frac} of a {area}. {name} can harvest his {fruit}s every {n} months. In addition, {name} owns a {x2}-{area} {fruit2} field that produces {k2} {fruit2}s per {area}. The {fruit2}s can be harvested every 4 months. In the span of two years, how many more {fruit}s does {name} harvest than {fruit2}s?
